sysevent_email_template.message_html:
We are sending this email to make you aware that upon leaving APi Group, you are still able to access your earnings statements (pay stubs) in Dayforce in case you may need them for your personal records. At the end of the calendar year, there will also be a link available to access your W2 electronically, unless you opted out of that method of receipt.

 

To access pay and tax documents please go to https://dayforcehcm.com. Your username is your APi Group Dayforce employee number. A separate email has been sent with password instructions.

 

Employee Number: ${variables.employee_number}

 

If you previously logged in with a password rather than single-sign-on, you will still be able to use that password. If you used a password previously but it has expired, you should be able to reset it by answering your security questions via the mobile app. If your default password (detailed in the “Message 2” email) is expired, you’ll need to call the APi Group Help Desk at 651-925-8511. Make sure to tell the help desk operator that you are accessing Dayforce with your “Terminated” role.

 

Any questions you have about the content of your pay statements should be directed to your former local HR administrator.
sysevent_email_template.name: Termination Personal Login Information 1
sysevent_email_template.subject: APi Group Dayforce Login Information
